thread.title: Sarah Michelle Gellar Rushes Her Five-Year-Old Son Rocky To The ER After Battling 'Nasty Virus'

author: perezhilton
title: Sarah Michelle Gellar Rushes Her Five-Year-Old Son Rocky To The ER After Battling 'Nasty Virus'
text:
What an appropriate name for such a strong kid!
Sarah Michelle Gellar spent the night on Thursday at the hospital with her five-year-old son , Rocky , after he was having trouble breathing while battling a "nasty virus." So scary!
This marks the 39-year-old's first trip to the ER as a mom — and we'd agree that's a pretty good run, all things considered!
Taking to Instagram on Friday, the actress revealed Rocky has been released and is now resting at home… but opened up about how "helpless" she felt seeing her youngest child suffering.
Related: Sarah Reveals Where She Thinks Buffy Would Be Today!
